title: Oregon's World Beer Cup Winners
name: Oregon's World Beer Cup Winners
description:
A Map by Kmikeym

The Brewers Association has announced the winners of the World Beer Cup 2006. Oregon only came in 5th with 11 medals (behind Washington (12), Colorado (12), Wisconsin (14), and California (25!)).

Of the eleven medals Oregon breweries took home, three were gold, three were silver, and five were bronze.

properties.name: Blue Heron Pale Ale
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym1313 N.W. Marshall, Portland ORBridgeport\'s Blue Heron Pale Ale was the Gold Medal winner for the Ordinary Bitter category.

properties.name: Caldera Dry Hop Red
properties.description: Posted by KmikeymÂ 540 Clover Lane, Ashland ORCaldera\'s second medal was a bronze for their Caldera Dry Hop Red in the American-Style Extra Special Bitter or Strong Bitter category. The gold went to Walking Man Brewery\'s Walking Man IPA in Washington.

properties.name: Caldera Pilsener Bier
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym540 Clover Lane, Ashland ORCaldera\'a Caldera Pilsener Bier was the Gold Medal winner for the Cellar or Unfiltered Beer category.

properties.name: India Pelican Ale
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym33180 Cape Kiwanda Drive, Pacific City ORPelican Pub won two silver medals. Their Kiwanda Cream Ale in the Golden or Blonde Ale category and their India Pelican Ale in the American-Style Pale Ale category. The Kiwanda Cream Ale was beat out by the Wisconsin based Hereford & Hops Brewpub\'s Whitetail Ale. The India Pelican Ale was beat by the California based Russian River Brewing Co.\'s Bling Pig IPA.

properties.name: Kiwanda Cream Ale
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym33180 Cape Kiwanda Drive, Pacific City ORPelican Pub won two silver medals. Their Kiwanda Cream Ale in the Golden or Blonde Ale category and their India Pelican Ale in the American-Style Pale Ale category. The Kiwanda Cream Ale was beat out by the Wisconsin based Hereford & Hops Brewpub\'s Whitetail Ale. The India Pelican Ale was beat by the California based Russian River Brewing Co.\'s Bling Pig IPA.

properties.name: Morimoto Black Obi Soba Ale
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym2320 OSU Drive, Newport ORRogue also picked up a silver for their Morimoto Black Obi Soba Ale in the Speciality Beer category. The gold medal winner was Flossmoor Station\'s Pullman Brown Ale in Illinois.

properties.name: Organic Deranger
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym1728 NE 40th Avenue, Portland ORLaurelwood Brewing\'s Organic Deranger (not listed on their site?)picked up a bronze in the Imperial or Double Red Ale category. Pizza Port Solana Beach\'s Shark Attack in California won the gold.

properties.name: Pyramid Crystal Weizen
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym1201 1st Ave S, Seattle WAListed by the Brewers Association as an Oregon company, Pyramid won two bronze medals. Their Pyramid Hefeweizen in the American-Style Hefeweizen category and Pyramid Crystal Weizen (not listed?) in the American-Style Wheat Beer category. Gold in the American-Style Hefeweizen went to Iganosato Mokumoku\'s Haru Urara of Japan and Cascade Brewing\'s Cascade Blonde Lager of Australia took Gold in the American-Style Wheat Beer category.

properties.name: Pyramid Hefeweizen
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym1201 1st Ave S, Seattle WAListed by the Brewers Association as an Oregon company, Pyramid won two bronze medals. Their Pyramid Hefeweizen in the American-Style Hefeweizen category and Pyramid Crystal Weizen (not listed?) in the American-Style Wheat Beer category. Gold in the American-Style Hefeweizen went to Iganosato Mokumoku\'s Haru Urara of Japan and Cascade Brewing\'s Cascade Blonde Lager of Australia took Gold in the American-Style Wheat Beer category.

properties.name: Session Premium Lager
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym506 Columbia St, Hood River ORThe cutest beer in Oregon, Full Sail\'s Session Premium Lager won a bronze in the American Cream Ale or Lager category. I don\'t understand how Texas based Pabst Brewing Companies\' Old Style could take gold. (Pabst Blue Ribbon also won Gold in the American-Style Premium Lager category)

properties.name: Shakespeare Stout
properties.description: Posted by Kmikeym2320 OSU Drive, Newport ORRogue\'s Shakespeare Stout was the Gold Medal winner for the American Style Stout category.
